title: Are You About to Fumble This Baddie?
subtitle: She's a 10. You're... taking this quiz.
shareTitle: Are You About to Fumble This Baddie?

questions.text: On a scale of 0–10, how scared are you of falling in love with her?
When a bitch be crazy, the right move is:

options.text: Tell her to calm the fuck down
Let her know she can let it all out

questions.text: She’s having a bad day. What’s the move?

options.text: Pull up with a sweet treat and let her vent
Leave her on read, she’ll figure it out

questions.text: Be honest — do you actually see a future with her?

options.text: Yeah, and it doesn’t scare me to say that
I think so but I don’t wanna jinx it
I try not to think about it
I’m just seeing where it goes (indefinitely)

verdicts.title: You Might Actually Deserve Her
verdicts.description: Rare. Don’t get comfortable though. Woo that bitch.

verdicts.title: You’re Slipping
verdicts.description: She’s noticed. You still have time but the clock is ticking. She’s a baddie. Woo that bitch.

verdicts.title: The Fumble Is in Motion
verdicts.description: The bag is mid-air. You’re just watching it fall. Think twice. Woo that bitch.

verdicts.title: Certified Fumbler
verdicts.description: She’s already writing the "I’ve been thinking..." text in her Notes app. You’re cooked.
